name: Game Theory Alpha
description: Game Theory Alpha is a choice-driven RPG game centered around our Theorist cast.  Play as Matthew Patrick (some times) in a fan-made scenario to assist him in saving his home from destruction (or not. It's up to you.). Partner up with familiar and new faces across Youtube to complete a total of 10+ endings (Also optional.)!! Battle monsters to collect GT themed fan art created by real fans (Not optional. )!
